articles.title: Von der Leyen proposes triggering clause to massively boost defense spending - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: European Commission president announces plan at Munich Security Conference.
articles.content:
In her speech on Friday, von der Leyen said Europe was now in another period of crisis which warrants a similar approach to that of the Covid pandemic.
